body.p: In this course, you will encounter a number of 3-D interactive models. These were created for this course by graphics design students from the Fayetteville Technical Community College in North Carolina for the purpose of increasing your practice and retention of course terminology and concepts. In order to take advantage of these models, your internet browser must have the Unity plugin. If you haven't already, visit the course Test and Configure page. Doing so will ensure that you have all of the software needed for this course.

A specific set of instructions will be provided as you encounter these models throughout the course, but for now, if you can see and interact with the image below, you are ready to advance to the following pages to begin your journey into Anatomy and Physiology.
